definition.text: The Support Program works pretty much like the Referral Program, only that you declare who your favorite Community Mods are!

paragraphs.text: Add the Support Program and use User Supporter nodes to set up references to your favorite moderators! Their profiles are loaded already!

While the Community is always ready to help with typical questions, it takes a certain level of experience and knowledge to provide effective support. This is why select Community Mods are in charge! Participating in this program is the best way to thank the people that selflessly help others!
